original_title: Imagin√§re Architektur - Der Baumeister Hans Scharoun
overview: Hans Scharoun has built houses which show not only structural substance and aesthetic forms but also how human beings should live in buildings. This depiction can only be imaginary - like reading invisible writing on walls. Bitomsky's film looks at several of Scharoun's buildings.
title: Imaginary Architecture, the architect Hans Scharoun
